problem_text:
Describe the automorphism group of the free associative algebra with n generators, n ⩾2.
It is known that all automorphisms are tame for n = 2 (A. J. Czerniakiewicz,
Trans. Amer. Math. Soc., 160 (1971), 393–401; 171 (1972), 309–315; L. G. Makar-
Limanov, Funct. Anal. Appl., 4 (1971), 262–264). For n = 3, the Anick automor-
phism is wild (U. U. Umirbaev, J. Reine Angew. Math., 605 (2007), 165–178). There
is an algorithm for recognizing automorphisms among endomorphisms of free associa-
tive algebras of finite rank over constructive fields (A. V. Jagzhev, Siberian. Math. J.,
21 (1980), 142–146).
L. A. Bokut’
